name: Tourist Bus Parking Simulator
description:
Driving a modern bus simulator is a real fun for the realistic bus simulation game lovers. It is time to improve your uphill bus parking simulation skills while enjoying the furious ride of hill climb buss simulator and become the best bus driver of the 3D bus games

Game Features :
• Smooth tilting and easy perfect game controls.
• Beautiful sound and music.
• User friendly GUI and detailed textures.
• Multiple camera views.
• A wide variety of uphill buses.
• Extreme traffic rush to drive.
